name: Babyface
description:
'''Kenneth Brian Edmonds''' (born April 10, 1959), better known by his stage name '''Babyface''', is an American singer, songwriter, and record producer. He has written and produced 26 number-one [[Contemporary R&B|R&B]] hit songs and 
won 13 [[Grammy Awards]]. He was ranked number 20 on ''[[NME]]''{{'s}} 50 of The Greatest Producers Ever list.
